column8: This design celebrates Winnie the Pooh, creation of A.A. Milne, and one of the most popular and enduring childrens' characters in the world. It's not hard to see why - all you have to do is pick up one of the books and it will all become clear. Love, joy and humour eminates from every page. Pooh is shown here scratchng his head and looking at a genuine advert from the newspapers of 1926, showing the first Pooh book.
column21: A T-shirt celebrating the 'Bear of very little brain', beloved by countless all over the world.
